description: Passing variables to the next scene when using the scene manager.

description: Easily pretty-print your tables to the console in a readable way.

name: jumper
description: Super-fast grid-based pathfinding for Lua.

name: bump
description: Simple, flexible and fast library for collision detection using axis-aligned bounding boxes (from version 2017.8 onwards Gideros contains a C-port of the library with the same API that should be used instead cbump.

name: Bresenham
description: Bresenham's line algorithm, implemented in Lua.
